channel.title: Awards on Gustavo Varela-Alvarenga
channel.description: Recent content in Awards on Gustavo Varela-Alvarenga

item.title: CNI National Economy Award (Prêmio CNI de Economia)
item.description: Issued by the Brazilian National Confederation of Industry with the support from the Brazilian Association of Graduate Centers in Economics. Award granted to the paper: ``Impacts of the Brazilian Sector Funds on industrial firms’ R&D inputs and outputs: New erspectives using a dose-response function” (original title: Impactos dos Fundos Setoriais nas Empresas: Novas Perspectivas a partir da Função Dose-Resposta). Click here for the full paper in English and here for more information about the award.
